## 

### The rise of AI-powered pro se lawsuits and the case for proactive accessibility

![Greg Williams (GW)](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/cropped-DEQUE_545-scaled-1-64x64.jpg)

January 29, 2026
[By Greg Williams](https://www.deque.com/about-deque-systems/greg-williams/)

Will AI be our savior or our downfall? It’s a question everyone seems to be asking, and opinions differ wildly. At one extreme, you’ve got…

[Read Article](https://www.deque.com/blog/the-rise-of-ai-powered-pro-se-lawsuits-and-the-case-for-proactive-accessibility/)

![Illustration of a ChatGPT-like window with a sample prompt which reads Draft a Pro Se ADA Title III Demand Letter](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/01.29.26-AI-powered-ADA-lawsuit-trend-704x448.png)

### How to design great alt text: An introduction

![Patrick Sturdivant new background](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Patrick-Sturdivant_new-background-64x64.png)

January 28, 2026
[By Patrick Sturdivant](/blog?author=patricksturdivant)

Images need alternative text (alt text). This is often one of the first things designers and developers learn about accessibility. On the surface, it’s a…

[Read Article](https://www.deque.com/blog/great-alt-text-introduction/)

![A sample webpage with an image embedded and a text popout that says alt equals what is effective alt text.](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/1.27-How-to-design-great-alt-text-An-introduction-704x448.png)

### Make accessibility testing up to 4x faster with Deque’s new AI-powered features

![Harris Schneiderman](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Screenshot-2024-04-15-at-8.06.20-PM-64x64.png)

January 15, 2026
[By Harris Schneiderman](/blog?author=harris-schneidermandeque-com)

We’re at an inflection point for digital accessibility. With AI accelerating content creation and code generation, and global regulations and standards rapidly evolving, the pace…

[Read Article](https://www.deque.com/blog/make-accessibility-testing-up-to-4x-faster-with-deques-new-ai-powered-features/)

![The Axe DevTools Extension AI-powered intelligent guided testing feature assessing interactive elements](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/01.09.26-New-Year-AI-Launch-Blog-image-1-704x448.jpg)

### ADA reform and the path to a true win-win for businesses and people with disabilities

![Glenda Sims headshot, smiling](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/glenda-sims350x350-300x300-1-64x64.jpg)

January 8, 2026
[By Glenda Sims](https://www.deque.com/about-deque-systems/glenda-sims/)

Recent proposals to “reform” the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) are being framed as a way to protect small businesses through notice-and-cure requirements. These proposed…

[Read Article](https://www.deque.com/blog/ada-reform-and-the-path-to-a-true-win-win-for-businesses-and-people-with-disabilities/)

![ADA reform and the path to a true win-win for businesses and people with disabilities](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/01.08.26-ADA-reform-Blog-image-704x448.jpg)

### Early signs of EAA enforcement across Europe

![Matthew Luken](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/matthew-luken-528x528-1-64x64.png)

December 19, 2025
[By Matthew Luken](https://www.deque.com/about-deque-systems/matthew-luken/)

A roundup of recent regulatory and legal developments you can reference in discussions with your risk and legal teams. As 2025 comes to a close,…

[Read Article](https://www.deque.com/blog/early-signs-of-eaa-enforcement-across-europe/)

![image of two people looking at an iPad together with the following words overlaid: Compliance Risk Regulation EAA](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/12.19-EAA-updates-blog-image-704x448.jpg)

### Get a sneak peek of Deque in 2026!

![ryan bateman 400x400 300x300](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/ryan-bateman-400x400-300x300-1-64x64.png)

December 11, 2025
[By Ryan Bateman](/blog?author=ryan-batemandeque-com)

Deque has always been about meeting the moment. In a time of incredible opportunity, we knew we needed to ensure we had the best platform possible for bringing our innovations and values to the global fight for digital equality.

[Read Article](https://www.deque.com/blog/get-a-sneak-peek-of-deque-in-2026/)

![Image of two people at laptops smiling and looking confident, with words overlayed: Innovation, social good, transformation, digital equality](https://www.deque.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Launch-blog-01-704x448.jpeg)

Show More
